mapper.select: SELECT last_insert_rowid() FROM user_resource WHERE rowid = (SELECT last_insert_rowid())

select * from user_resource r join user_resource_tag t on r.RESOURCE_ID=t.RESOURCE_ID and r.USER_ID=t.USER_ID join user_tag g on t.TAG_ID=g.TAG_ID and t.USER_ID=g.USER_ID where r.USER_ID=#{userId} and g.TAG_ID=#{tagId} and r.DELETED=0
